translation.en: -♪ Chico ♪ -♪ Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.it: Chico Bon Bon Chico Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon Bon ♪
translation.it: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon Bon!

translation.en: ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪ ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
-I saw a m-m-monkey! -[all] Tool belt!
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.it: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪ ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.it: Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: Monkey with a tool belt!
[Rainbow] "Chico Bon Bon and the Ice Cream Monster!"
translation.it: Chico Bon Bon e il mostro del gelato!

translation.en: I scream, you scream, we all scream for…
translation.it: Io chiedo, tu chiedi, tutti chiediamo…

translation.en: Ice cream?
Chico, I love that you've re-engineered my Fridgey Boo Boo
translation.it: Chico, adoro che tu abbia riprogettato il mio Frigoriferino

translation.en: to make ice cream,
but it keeps coming out melty.
Oh, I think I see the problem, Mrs. Coleslaw.
There must be something wrong with Fridgey's insulation.
Oh dear! His what, now?
Insulation.
Check it out. Fridgey Boo Boo's got a freezing machine to make ice cream,
translation.it: Ecco. Frigoriferino ha un congelatore per fare il gelato,

translation.en: and this foam material is insulation.
It's what keeps the ice cream cold once it's made.
translation.it: È ciò che mantiene il gelato freddo.

translation.en: The foam insulation makes it hard for heat to get in. That's why Fridgey can keep things cold.
translation.it: Impedisce al calore di entrare. Così Frigoriferino mantiene il freddo.

translation.en: Looks like Fridgey Boo Boo doesn't have enough insulation. That's why the ice cream comes out melty.
translation.it: Frigoriferino ha poco isolamento. Per questo il gelato si scioglie.

translation.en: Oh no! What do we do, Chico?
Don't worry. I'll just add some more foam for better insulation.
There. Now you've got the perfect ice cream making machine.
translation.it: Ecco. Ora ha la macchina perfetta per fare il gelato.

translation.en: Go on, give it a try.
Well, all right.
Nice and cold, just the way I like it.
translation.it: Bello freddo, come piace a me.

translation.en: Insulation!
Thank you, Chico.
And thank you, Fridgey Boo Boo.
The banana phone!
Chico Bon Bon! You got a problem? We can solve 'em!
translation.it: Chico Bon Bon! C'è qualche problema? Noi lo risolviamo.

translation.en: [in Italian accent] Freddy and Betty Lemuretti here.
Has this ever happened to you?
translation.it: Vi è mai successa questa cosa?

translation.en: You're enjoying a delicious ice cream treat when a giant monster grabs it right out of your hand?
translation.it: Vi state godendo un delizioso gelato, e un mostro gigante ve lo ruba.

translation.en: No, that's never happened to us.
translation.it: No, non ci è mai successo.

translation.en: Actually, it has happened to us.
translation.it: In realtà, sì, ci è successo.

translation.en: [both] Us too!
More ice cream!
That monster ate all of our ice cream!
translation.it: Il mostro ha mangiato tutto il gelato!

translation.en: And she's still hungry!
More ice cream!
Say no more. We're on our way!
Fix-It Force, we need to feed that monster fast, or she'll destroy Blunderburg looking for more ice cream.
translation.it: Team, dobbiamo saziare il mostro, o finirà per distruggere Blunderbug.

translation.en: It's time to bring the ice cold awesome!
translation.it: È l'ora di entrare in azione!

translation.en: [kids] Chico Bon Bon!
Rainbow Thunder!
I'm Neil Ostrich here on the scene.
translation.it: Sono Nick Penna qui in prima linea.

translation.en: Literally, on the scene.
There's a monster on the loose in Blunderburg
and it's hungry for one thing:
translation.it: ed è affamato di una cosa:

translation.en: ice cream!
I don't-- Whoa!
More ice cream!
Cones, sundaes, novelty treats…
No form of ice cream is safe!
Who can save the city from that ice-cream-craving creature?
translation.it: Chi salverà la città dalla creatura bramosa di gelato?

translation.en: More ice cream!
I'm Chico Bon Bon, monkey with a tool belt!
translation.it: Sono Chico Bon Bon, la scimmietta ingegnosa.

translation.en: And we're the Fix-It Force!
translation.it: E noi siamo Il Team Ingegno!

translation.en: And that's one big monster!
translation.it: E quello è un grosso mostro!

translation.en: Which means we need a monster-sized serving of ice cream to fill her tummy,
translation.it: Serve una porzione mostruosa di gelato per saziarlo

translation.en: so she'll never come after our ice cream again.
translation.it: così non ci ruberà più il nostro.

translation.en: But Betty and I will never be able to make enough!
translation.it: Ma non riusciremo a farne abbastanza!

translation.en: Then what we need is all the ice cream left in Blunderburg. Operation Ice Cream begins now!
translation.it: Useremo il gelato rimasto a Blunderburg. L'Operazione Gelato inizia ora!

translation.en: Our tastiest mission yet!
[Neil] As the Ice Cream Monster continues her rampage,
Mayor Murphy has declared a level-five ice cream emergency!
translation.it: il sindaco ha dichiarato un'emergenza gelato!

translation.en: Citizens of Blunderburg, the Fix-It Force needs your ice cream!
translation.it: Cittadini di Blunderburg, il Team Ingegno ha bisogno del vostro gelato!

translation.en: Thanks, Mayor!
-All right! -So much ice cream!
[Clark] Our bowl is full!
Then it's time to feed the monster!
translation.it: È ora di sfamare il mostro!

translation.en: More ice cream!
-[Chico] Quick! Release the ice cream! -Uh, Chico, I think we're too late.
translation.it: Presto! Datele il gelato! Mi sa che è troppo tardi.

translation.en: What do you mean?
The ice cream's all melted!
No melty ice cream!
Okay, so she really doesn't like melty ice cream.
translation.it: Ok, il gelato sciolto non le piace per niente.

translation.en: We've gotta figure out a way to keep the ice cream cold long enough to feed that monster.
translation.it: Dobbiamo mantenere il gelato freddo abbastanza a lungo da sfamarla.

translation.en: Yeah, like with a freezer!
But it would need to be a monster-sized freezer.
translation.it: Ma dovrebbe essere un freezer gigantesco.

translation.en: A monster-sized freezer!
That's a great idea, Clark!
Rainbow, set a course to Mrs. Coleslaw's house.
Chico, are you sure you wanna do this?
translation.it: Chico, sei sicuro di volerlo fare?

translation.en: Remember what happened the last time Fridgey Boo Boo transformed into Fridgebot?
translation.it: Ricordi quando Frigoriferino si è trasformato in Frigo-robot?

translation.en: Oh, I remember!
He went through town shooting ice cubes at everything!
translation.it: Andava in giro sparando cubetti di ghiaccio!

translation.en: I know, but he's our only hope.
translation.it: Lo so, ma è la nostra unica speranza.

translation.en: Now presenting…
[Chico] Fridgebot 2.0, the perfect ice cream delivery machine.
translation.it: Frigo-robot 2.0, la perfetta macchina per il gelato.

translation.en: Now with ice cream blasting power!
Too melty!
Oh! It just needs a little more insulation to keep all that ice cream cold.
And… we're good to go!
I even loaded up some new ice cream jokes.
translation.it: Ho caricato delle battute sul gelato.

translation.en: Why do ice cream cones carry umbrellas?
translation.it: Perché i coni portano gli ombrelli?

translation.en: Why?
Because there's always a chance of sprinkles!
More ice cream!
The Ice Cream Monster, she's coming this way!
translation.it: Il Mostro del Gelato si avvicina!

translation.en: We've gotta feed her, fast!
Let's go, Fridgebot!
Bye-bye, Fridgey! Have fun, now.
I'm reporting live from downtown Blunderburg,
where the hungry Ice Cream Monster is still searching for ice cr-- Whoa!
translation.it: dove l'affamato Mostro del Gelato cerca ancora il…

translation.en: Nom? Ice cream?
More ice cream!
[Chico] Hey, Ice Cream Monster!
Okay, Fridgebot, do your thing! Ice cream blasters, go!
translation.it: Ok, Frigo-robot, fai il tuo dovere! Spara-gelato, via!

translation.en: Activate booster cannons!
How's about a little strawberry and some chocolate chip!
Ooh! Don't forget peanut butter! And rainbow sprinkles!
translation.it: - E burro d'arachidi! - E codette arcobaleno.

translation.en: [gasps] I think it's working!
More ice cream!
[Clark] What?
She still wants more?
I don't think she'll stop until she's totally full, and even Fridgebot can't feed her fast enough!
translation.it: Non si fermerà finché non sarà sazia, e Frigo-robot non è abbastanza veloce!

translation.en: You're right, Rainbow. We need to make her a super-sized bowl of ice cream so she can really chow down.
translation.it: Hai ragione, Rainbow. Le daremo una coppa enorme per saziarla.

translation.en: But where are we gonna find a bowl big enough to serve a giant monster?
translation.it: Ma dove troveremo una ciotola così grande?

translation.en: [Chico] Giant bowl… Giant bowl…
[gasps] The Blunderdome.
It's just the right size and shape
translation.it: È della giusta misura e forma

translation.en: for the biggest, baddest bowl of ice cream ever!
translation.it: per la più grande e pazzesca coppa di gelato di sempre!

translation.en: Fridgebot, fill it up!
Now, mint!
Now, vanilla!
Now, blunderberry!
And finally… the cherry on top.
Whoa-ho-ho! That ought to be enough for the monster!
Uh… guys! The ice cream is already melting! We gotta keep it cold!
translation.it: Il gelato si scioglie! Dobbiamo tenerlo freddo!

translation.en: We spent all this time collecting the ice cream and now it's going to melt!
translation.it: Tanto tempo a raccoglierlo e ora si scioglie!

translation.en: We have to figure out how to keep the Blunderdome cold enough to keep it from melting. What if it doesn't work?
translation.it: Dobbiamo tenere la Blundarena fredda. E se non funziona?

translation.en: Chico? Maybe now's a good time for a banana break.
translation.it: Forse è l'ora della pausa banana.

translation.en: [Chico] Okay, the monster wants ice cream, -but we can't keep the ice cream cold. -[buzzing]
translation.it: Ok, il mostro vuole il gelato, ma non possiamo tenerlo freddo.

translation.en: Fridgey Boo Boo can only keep it cold when it's inside him.
translation.it: Frigoriferino lo raffredda solo se lo contiene.

translation.en: -Outside, it melts! -[buzzing]
Because there's no insulation.
Insulation!
Blazing bananas, that's it! We need insulation.
translation.it: Per tutte le banane! Ci serve isolamento.

translation.en: Oh yeah!
If we insulate the entire Blunderdome, we can keep the ice cream cold.
translation.it: Isolando la Blundarena terremo il gelato freddo.

translation.en: Great idea!
Rainbow, activate foam cannon and prepare to insulate.
translation.it: Rainbow, attiva il cannone di schiuma e preparati a isolare.

translation.en: -Hang on to your whiskers! -[engine revs]
Folks, I can't believe what I'm seeing.
The Fix-It Force are insulating the Blunderdome with foam!
translation.it: Il Team Ingegno sta isolando la Blundarena con la schiuma!

translation.en: -We did it! -Yeah!
[Chico] The ice cream isn't melting!
It's an insulation sensation!
-[Clark and Thunder] Whoa! -She is hungry!
All full!
-[all cheering] -She's full!
Bye-bye!
We saved the city, Fridgebot.
Now there's only one thing left to do…
translation.it: Resta una sola cosa da fare.

translation.en: [Chico] Ice cream! Come get your ice cream.
Mmm! Thanks for the ice cream, Chico.
The Ice Cream Monster's gone for good! Thank you, Chico.
translation.it: Il Mostro del Gelato se n'è andato! Grazie, Chico.

translation.en: We couldn't have done it without Fridgey Boo Boo here.
Oh! I love you, Fridgey Boo Boo!
What is ice cream's favorite day of the week?
translation.it: Qual è l'ora più bella della giornata?

translation.en: [all] What is it?
Sunday!
Oh, Fridgey Boo Boo!
